description: The chef patron Giacomo Caravello in the short span of a few years has created his “space” in the area, definitely becoming one of the best places in Milazzo: the contemporary interiors are truly refined and airy, while the cuisine–which grows year after year–is assured thanks to modern techniques and Sicilian and Mediterranean references. The wine selection is accompanied by an intriguing range of cocktails.
